TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All spiders can be upgraded to giant spiders once the city hosting Silksong Cradle reaches 12 population.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]All spiders can be upgraded to giant spiders once the city hosting Silksong Cradle reaches 12 population.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]All spiders can be upgraded to giant spiders once the city hosting Silksong Cradle reaches 12 population.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]All spiders can be upgraded to giant spiders once the city hosting Silksong Cradle reaches 12 population.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]All spiders can be upgraded to giant spiders once the city hosting Silksong Cradle reaches 12 population.

TEXT.English: Archosian Hunters spend weeks in the wilds of Erebus, stalking prey with a spider companion. When it is time to strike, the spider attacks and paralyses the target with venom before the hunter deals the deathblow. The tribe have been living with spiders for so long that the venom in the carcass is no longer deadly to them - though it does take it's toll. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When a hunting team survives the wilds long enough to become noteworthy, they may be sent further afield to hunt more dangerous prey. The spider becomes more deadly as it grows and the hunter relies on it to a greater degree. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The most successful hunters may find that they develop mutations as they continue to eat the poisoned meat of their kills. This is seen as a "gift" from Mother and a sign that the hunter is favoured. In anycase, many of these mutations prove beneficial in combat and the Spiderkin is practically immune to further poisoning.
TEXT.French: Les Veneurs Archosiens passent des semaines dans les contrées sauvages d'Erebus, pistant ses proies avec son compagnon Araignée. Lorsqu'il faut frapper, l'Araignée attaque et paralyse sa cible avec son venin avant que le Veneur fasse le tir mortel. Le clan a vécu avec les Araignées depuis si longtemps que le venin présent dans la carcasse n'est plus mortel pour eux (même s'il continue de prendre son dû). [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Quand un binôme de chasse survit suffisamment longtemps pour être remarqué, ils peuvent être envoyés encore plus loin pour chasser des proies encore plus dangereuses. L'Araignée devient plus dangereuse à mesure qu'elle grandit et le Reclus compte encore plus sur elle. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Les chasseurs les plus efficaces peuvent découvrir qu'ils développent des mutations tandis qu'ils continuent de manger la viande empoisonnée de leurs victimes. Elles sont vues comme des "présents" de la Mère et un signe que le chasseur est favorisé. N'importe comment, la plupart de ces mutations se révèlent bénéfiques en combat et l'Arachnomorphe est pratiquement immunisé à tout empoisonnement ultérieur.
TEXT.German: Archosian Hunters spend weeks in the wilds of Erebus, stalking prey with a spider companion. When it is time to strike, the spider attacks and paralyses the target with venom before the hunter deals the deathblow. The tribe have been living with spiders for so long that the venom in the carcass is no longer deadly to them - though it does take it's toll. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When a hunting team survives the wilds long enough to become noteworthy, they may be sent further afield to hunt more dangerous prey. The spider becomes more deadly as it grows and the hunter relies on it to a greater degree. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Die erfolgreichsten Jäger mögen Mutationen an sich bemerken, wenn sie nur kontinuierlich das vergiftete Fleisch ihrer Beute verzehren. Dies wird als ein "Geschenk" von Mutter und als Zeichen ihrer Gunst angesehen. In jedem Fall entpuppen sich viele dieser Mutationen als nützlich im Kampf, so sind die Sipplinge der Spinnentiere z.B. praktisch immun gegen weitere Vergiftungen.
TEXT.Italian: Archosian Hunters spend weeks in the wilds of Erebus, stalking prey with a spider companion. When it is time to strike, the spider attacks and paralyses the target with venom before the hunter deals the deathblow. The tribe have been living with spiders for so long that the venom in the carcass is no longer deadly to them - though it does take it's toll. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When a hunting team survives the wilds long enough to become noteworthy, they may be sent further afield to hunt more dangerous prey. The spider becomes more deadly as it grows and the hunter relies on it to a greater degree. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The most successful hunters may find that they develop mutations as they continue to eat the poisoned meat of their kills. This is seen as a "gift" from Mother and a sign that the hunter is favoured. In anycase, many of these mutations prove beneficial in combat and the Spiderkin is practically immune to further poisoning.
TEXT.Spanish: Archosian Hunters spend weeks in the wilds of Erebus, stalking prey with a spider companion. When it is time to strike, the spider attacks and paralyses the target with venom before the hunter deals the deathblow. The tribe have been living with spiders for so long that the venom in the carcass is no longer deadly to them - though it does take it's toll. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When a hunting team survives the wilds long enough to become noteworthy, they may be sent further afield to hunt more dangerous prey. The spider becomes more deadly as it grows and the hunter relies on it to a greater degree. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The most successful hunters may find that they develop mutations as they continue to eat the poisoned meat of their kills. This is seen as a "gift" from Mother and a sign that the hunter is favoured. In anycase, many of these mutations prove beneficial in combat and the Spiderkin is practically immune to further poisoning.

TEXT.English: Ia! Black queen of the depths with a thousand young!

TEXT.German: Ia! Black queen of the depths with a thousand young!
TEXT.Italian: Ia! Black queen of the depths with a thousand young!
TEXT.Spanish: Ia! Black queen of the depths with a thousand young!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Apply "Marked Prey" to all enemy units in range.

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Apply "Marked Prey" to all enemy units in range.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Explode and apply poison to all units in range.

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Explode and apply poison to all units in range.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Explode and apply poison to all units in range.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Give "Consume the Weak" Promotion to baby spiders and spiders (but not giant spiders) in stack.

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Give "Consume the Weak" Promotion to baby spiders and spiders (but not giant spiders) in stack.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Venom Secretion to newly created melee and recon units in the city.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Venom Secretion to newly created melee and recon units in the city.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Venom Secretion to newly created melee and recon units in the city.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Venom Secretion to newly created melee and recon units in the city.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Venom Secretion to newly created melee and recon units in the city.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Grants access to the Web Spell. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Jointed Limbs to newly created melee and recon units in the city.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Grants access to the Web Spell. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Jointed Limbs to newly created melee and recon units in the city.

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Grants access to the Web Spell. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Jointed Limbs to newly created melee and recon units in the city.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Gain the ability to burrow underground. Reveal to gain buffs for 1 turn, but also become vulnerable to enemy attacks. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Chitin Carapace to newly created melee and recon units in the city.
